dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3915458R] Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Inf
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: Edward Ruttenberg [mailto:eruttenberg@lpsla.com] Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2007 3:07 PM To: DMCA Subject: RE: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3915458R] Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Infringing Jennifer Aniston Photos Attaching the takedown letter, as you requested. Edward A. Ruttenberg, Esq. LEOPOLD, PETRICH & SMITH, P.C. 2049 Century Park East, Suite, 3110 Los Angeles, California 90067-3274 Phone: 310/277-3333 Fax: 310/277-7444 -----Original Message----- From: DMCA [mailto:dmca@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2007 8:43 AM To: Edward Ruttenberg Cc: Copyright Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3915458R] Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Infringing Jennifer Aniston Photos Please re-send the below-pasted complaint since there is no attachment to this e-mail. Sorry for the inconvenience. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2007 6:19 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3915458R] Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Infringing Jennifer Aniston Photos ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Infringing Jennifer Aniston Photos Added by system at Wednesday, May 2 2007 07:25 pm X-MailFrom: eruttenberg@lpsla.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 2 19:25:52 2007 Received: (qmail 14934 invoked by alias); 3 May 2007 00:25:52 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 14931 invoked from network); 3 May 2007 00:25:50 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 3 May 2007 00:25:50 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 2 May 2007 19:25:49 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 02 May 2007 19:25:50 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from eruttenberg@lpsla.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HjP8m-000432-V7 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 02 May 2007 19:25:49 -0500 Received: from [64.168.222.195] (helo=ntmail1.domain1.local) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from eruttenberg@lpsla.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HjP8h-000HrW-Eo for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 02 May 2007 19:25:44 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C78D19.9332264D" Subject: Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Infringing Jennifer Aniston Photos Date: Wed, 2 May 2007 17:25:38 -0700 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Toptensources: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Infringing Jennifer Aniston Photos thread-index: AceNGZMrh35covVkSY2DPHeavzB0ig== From: "Edward Ruttenberg" To: , Cc: "Hampton, Carolyn \(NBC Universal\)" , "Burg, David \(NBC Universal\)" , "Ragsac, Ted \(NBC Universal\)" , "Thomas Peistrup" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 03 May 2007 00:25:50.0079 (UTC) FILETIME=[9A00C8F0:01C78D19] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Attached is a letter demanding that the stolen infringing photos of Jennifer Aniston be taken down immediately from your website and not further exploited. Edward A. Ruttenberg, Esq. LEOPOLD, PETRICH & SMITH, P.C. 2049 Century Park East, Suite, 3110 Los Angeles, California 90067-3274 Phone: 310/277-3333 Fax: 310/277-7444 MIME element (text/html)
Attached is a letter demanding that the stolen infringing photos of Jennifer Aniston be taken down immediately from your website and not further exploited.
 
Edward A. Ruttenberg, Esq.
LEOPOLD, PETRICH & SMITH, P.C.
